cards.name: Cardboard Shield
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

cards.name: Cardboard Shield+
cards.description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile +3.

cards.name: Clever Clash
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 8 Block.
Otherwise, deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Clever Clash+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 11 Block.
Otherwise, deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Training Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand or this by 2 this combat.

cards.name: Training Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand or this by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Blood Guard
cards.description:
Lose 4 HP.
Gain 16 Block.

cards.name: Blood Guard+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 18 Block.

cards.name: Blood to Gold
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 10 Gold.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Blood to Gold+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Gain 15 Gold.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Crumbling Crash
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Gain 3 Block.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Crumbling Crash+
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Gain 6 Block.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Cursed Strike
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Add a random Curse to your hand.

cards.name: Cursed Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 19 damage.
Add a random Curse to your hand.

cards.name: Elimination
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Exhaust your hand.

cards.name: Elimination+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.

cards.name: Ground Pound
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Ground Pound+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hatred
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Hatred+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, add a random Attack to your hand.

cards.name: Battle Stance
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 2 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Battle Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Gain 3 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Curse Blast
cards.description:
Deal 25 damage.
If this doesn't kill an enemy, add a random Curse to your deck.

cards.name: Curse Blast+
cards.description:
Deal 35 damage.
If this doesn't kill an enemy, add a random Curse to your deck.

cards.name: Devastation
cards.description:
Lose 6 HP.
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Devastation+
cards.description:
Lose 3 HP.
Deal damage equal to your missing HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Draining Doom
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
Lose 5 Max HP.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Draining Doom+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
Lose 5 Max HP.
Exhaust.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Insult
cards.description:
Apply X Weak.
Apply X Vulnerable.
Gain X Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Insult+
cards.description:
Apply X+1 Weak.
Apply X+1 Vulnerable.
Gain X+1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strike Storm
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.

cards.name: Strike Storm+
cards.description: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, play a πStrike.

cards.name: Pinpoint Kick
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If this breaks the enemy's Block, apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pinpoint Kick+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage. If this breaks the enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Shadow Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Gain 5 Block next turn.

cards.name: Shadow Strike+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Gain 7 Block next turn.

cards.name: Venom Sigh
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Apply 3 Poison.

cards.name: Venom Sigh+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Apply 4 Poison.

cards.name: Bandage Whip
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
The enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Bandage Whip+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
The enemy loses 4 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Combo Trick
cards.description:
Add a Shiv to your hand.
Apply 3 Poison.
Gain 3 Block next turn.
Draw 2 cards.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Combo Trick+
cards.description:
Add a Shiv to your hand.
Apply 3 Poison.
Gain 5 Block next turn.
Draw 2 cards.
Discard 1 card.

cards.name: Entry Plan
cards.description:
Draw a card.
If it's an Attack, deal 3 damage.

cards.name: Entry Plan+
cards.description:
Draw a card.
If it's an Attack, deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Prepare Victim
cards.description:
Apply Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare Victim+
cards.description:
Apply Slow.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scaled Poison
cards.description:
Apply 1 Poison.
Double the amount of Poison this card applies this combat.

cards.name: Scaled Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
Double the amount of Poison this card applies this combat.

cards.name: Shield Swipe
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Shield Swipe+
cards.description:
Steal the enemy's Block.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Cursed Body
cards.description:
Gain 2 Intangible.
Become Cursed - Injury.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cursed Body+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Intangible.
Become Cursed - Clumsy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Deadly Dodge
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Exhaust and gain 1 Intangible.
Otherwise, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

cards.name: Deadly Dodge+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Exhaust and gain 1 Intangible.
Otherwise, apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.

cards.name: Evasive Thoughts
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add a random Skill to your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Evasive Thoughts+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, add a random Skill to your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Ghostly Blitz
cards.description:
Play a copy of every Attack in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ghostly Blitz+
cards.description:
Play a copy of every Attack in your Exhaust pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jackpot
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 7 Poison.
Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jackpot+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 7 Poison.
Gain !vexMod:SecondMagic! Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Midnight Strike
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat.
Deal 100 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Midnight Strike+
cards.description:
Can only be played if you have played exactly 11 cards this combat.
Deal 100 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Beam Pop
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 1 Lock-On.

cards.name: Beam Pop+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply 2 Lock-On.

cards.name: Charge Beam
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw an additional card next turn.

cards.name: Charge Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw an additional card next turn.

cards.name: Orb Boomerang
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Has a special effect based on the rightmost Orb.

cards.name: Orb Boomerang+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage. Has a special effect based on the rightmost Orb.

cards.name: Orb Shield
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each unique Orb you have.

cards.name: Orb Shield+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each unique Orb you have.

cards.name: Rocket Punch
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Choose an Attack in your hand.
Add a copy of that card to your discard pile.

cards.name: Rocket Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Choose an Attack in your hand.
Add a copy of that card to your hand.

cards.name: Golden Lightning
cards.description:
Channel 1 [#EFC851]Golden [#EFC851]πLightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Lightning+
cards.description:
Channel 1 [#EFC851]Golden [#EFC851]πLightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description:
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Evoke your rightmost Orb.

cards.name: Hex+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Evoke your rightmost Orb.

cards.name: Reflex Channel
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost.
Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning.

cards.name: Reflex Channel+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, Channel 1 Frost.
Otherwise, Channel 1 Lightning.

cards.name: Sharp Orbs
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb Slot.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each of your Orbs.

cards.name: Sharp Orbs+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb Slot.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each of your Orbs.

cards.name: Shock Kick
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 2 Focus until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Shock Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain 3 Focus until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Tune Up
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Tune Up+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Increase the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Blaze Kick
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Gain 1 stack of ANY random buff.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Blaze Kick+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Gain 2 stacks of ANY random buff.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Block Beam
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Block Beam+
cards.description:
Gain 19 Block.
Deal 19 damage.

cards.name: Chaotic Reactor
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel a random Orb.

cards.name: Chaotic Reactor+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, Channel a random Orb.

cards.name: Dark Conflux
cards.description:
Channel 1 Dark.
Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X times.

cards.name: Dark Conflux+
cards.description:
Channe1 1 Dark.
Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs X+1 times.

cards.name: Growing Storm
cards.description:
Channel 1 Lightning.
Increase the amount of Lightning this card Channels this combat by 1.

cards.name: Growing Storm+
cards.description:
Channel 2 Lightning.
Increase the amount of Lightning this card Channels this combat by 1.

cards.name: Overload
cards.description:
Channel a random Orb for each Orb slot you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overload+
cards.description:
Channel a random Orb for each Orb slot you have.
Gain 2 Orb slots.
Exhaust.

cards.name: System Update
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Focus.

cards.name: System Update+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Focus.

cards.name: Battle Rage
cards.description:
Remove your Debuffs.
Gain 6 Strength.
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Battle Rage+
cards.description:
Remove your Debuffs.
Gain 12 Strength.
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defensive Stance
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
At the end of your turn, gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defensive Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
At the end of your turn, gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Execute
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage twice.
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.

cards.name: Execute+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage twice.
Can only be played at or below 50% HP.

cards.name: Eye Beam
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eye Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Apply 3 Weak.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Face Slap
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Deal 12 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Face Slap+
cards.description:
Remove all Block from the enemy.
Deal 14 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Gilded Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 3 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gilded Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Gain 5 Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gloat
cards.description: Gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Gloat+
cards.description: Gain 4 Strength.

cards.name: Gorgon's Glare
cards.description:
Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Heal 2 HP.
Draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gorgon's Glare+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 4 Strength.
Heal 4 HP.
Draw a card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heavy Slash
cards.description: Deal 16 damage.

cards.name: Heavy Slash+
cards.description: Deal 18 damage.

cards.name: Snake's Skin
cards.description: Whenever you would receive unblocked Attack damage, prevent 2 of it.

cards.name: Snake's Skin+
cards.description: Whenever you would receive unblocked Attack damage, prevent 3 of it.

cards.name: Taunt
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Taunt+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Coin Blast
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain some Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Coin Blast+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain some Gold.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Plotting
cards.description: Draw 2 additional cards next turn.

cards.name: Plotting+
cards.description: Draw 3 additional cards next turn.

cards.name: Antique Fury
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage for every Relic you have.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Antique Fury+
cards.description: Deal 3 damage for every Relic you have.

cards.name: Full Service
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 5 Block next turn.
Gain 5 Gold.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Weak.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! cards.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! more cards next turn.
Heal !vexMod:SecondMagic! HP.
Gain 1 Energy next turn.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Full Service+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 6 Block next turn.
Gain 6 Gold.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Weak.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.
Apply !vexMod:SecondMagic! Poison.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! cards.
Draw !vexMod:SecondMagic! more cards next turn.
Heal !vexMod:SecondMagic! HP.
Gain 1 Energy next turn.
Upgrade a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Touch
cards.description:
Whenever you deal unblocked Attack damage, gain that much gold.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Golden Touch+
cards.description:
Whenever you deal unblocked Attack damage, gain that much gold.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Infectious Loot
cards.description: Apply Poison equal to the number of Relics you have.

cards.name: Infectious Loot+
cards.description: Apply Poison equal to the number of Relics you have.

cards.name: Mitosis
cards.description:
Add a random Colorless card to your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mitosis+
cards.description:
Add a random upgraded Colorless card to your deck.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resourcefulness
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Resourcefulness+
cards.description:
Put one card from your draw pile into your hand.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Stairway Strike
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to twice the number of the floor you're on.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stairway Strike+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to twice the number of the floor you're on.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fear
cards.description: At the end of your turn, Exhaust this and gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Gorgon's Gaze
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust all other cards in your hand.

cards.name: Greed
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, lose 6 Gold.

cards.name: Sloth
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, draw one less card next turn.

cards.name: Virus
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, add a copy of it into your hand.

cards.name: Weakness
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you draw this card, reduce the damage of a random Attack in your hand by 2.

relics.name: Charge Upper
relics.description: Every time you gain 35 Block, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Oops, I fell asleep without plugging it in..."

relics.name: Cold Yogurt
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Frost.
relics.flavorText: You wonder if your enemies are lactose-intolerant.

relics.name: Consolation Prize
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP, gain that much Gold.
relics.flavorText: Gold oozes from your wounds.

relics.name: Dusty Game Cartridge
relics.description: Whenever you draw a card (besides your hand each turn), gain 1 Block.
relics.flavorText: It's unclear which system the game was meant for.

relics.name: Gazer Beam
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat applies 2 Lock-On.
relics.flavorText: Last used to spell "KRONOS".

relics.name: Happy Drink
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 2 Max HP.
Whenever you enter a shop, gain 1 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: The shop offers free refills.

relics.name: Memory Locket
relics.description: On the first turn of each combat, Retain your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you squeeze it hard enough you can remember the open beta.

relics.name: Pain Converter
relics.description: When you take 10 or more damage in one hit, gain [E] and draw a card next turn.
relics.flavorText: The machine seems to be magnetically attracted to your exposed injuries.

relics.name: Well-Worn Anklet
relics.description: At the start of turns 3 and 7, gain 7 Block.
relics.flavorText: Still gotta dig up the paper on this one.

relics.name: Backup Battery
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have empty Orb slots, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: Conserve energy! Shut off Orb slots when you're not using them.

relics.name: Berry Bomb
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 6 Max HP.
After 10 combats, explodes, dealing 50 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Tastes explosive!

relics.name: Better-O-Tron
relics.description: The next 3 unupgraded cards you add to your deck are Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: This mechanical grub lurches for your head intermittently.

relics.name: Dragon Fruit
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 5. At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.
relics.flavorText: As a connoisseur would say, piquant.

relics.name: Focus Sash
relics.description: Damage that would bring you to 0 HP from over 10 HP brings you to 1 HP instead.
relics.flavorText: It's super effective!

relics.name: Gilded Shrine
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 7 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Molten gold pours endlessly down the shrine.

relics.name: Invisible Cloak
relics.description: At the start of combat, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: You're far too modest to "wear" this.

relics.name: Key Chain
relics.description: When you play your first targeted Attack each combat, the enemy loses Strength equal to damage taken this turn.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly sharp!

relics.name: Madness Lens
relics.description: At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this combat.
relics.flavorText: The Spire looks like a hellish, twisting wasteland through this glass.

relics.name: Protector Bot
relics.description: When you play 2 or less cards in a turn, gain 5 Block at the end of the turn.
relics.flavorText: This little bot dives in to take attacks when you're wide open.

relics.name: Randomized Relic
relics.description: Has different qualities every time you find it. Click to view effects.
relics.flavorText: Different every time!

relics.name: Shifting Skin
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 stack of ANY random buff.
relics.flavorText: Your body flows fluidly, changing to adapt to each situation...

relics.name: Strike Shooter
relics.description: At the start of every third turn, play a πStrike at a random target.
relics.flavorText: All your sword-firing needs in one medium package!

relics.name: Bejeweled Orb
relics.description: Whenever you have 3 of the same type of Orb in a row, Evoke them and Channel 2 random Orbs.
relics.flavorText: You have an urge to match items of similar color.

relics.name: Box of Bandaids
relics.description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: Vends only when shown cool techniques.

relics.name: Chest Statue
relics.description: ALL chests contain 2 Relics.
relics.flavorText: Made by a famous lootomancer.

relics.name: Code Smelter
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, trigger its passive ability.
relics.flavorText: Combines subprocesses into one big clump. Simple!

relics.name: Cooling Fan
relics.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: This fan helps you save processes when performing monster solution options.

relics.name: Flippers of Frivolty
relics.description:
Whenever you climb a floor, gain 15 Gold.
Whenever you leave The Merchant, lose 1 HP for every 5 gold held.
relics.flavorText: These flippers make you want to spend a lot.

relics.name: Helpful Mold
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, gain 1 Strength this turn only.
relics.flavorText: This mold siphons off bits of your shield to feed you.

relics.name: Orb of Greed
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Golden πLightning.
relics.flavorText: Mmm, money!

relics.name: Plague Vial
relics.description: Non-Boss enemies have 15% less HP.
relics.flavorText: The bosses must take their vitamin gummies.

relics.name: Plasma Pancake
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 4 Max HP.
At the start of each combat, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: It's literally on fire.

relics.name: Red Plotting Stone
relics.description:
Glows on a random floor.
Right click on it while it's glowing for a massive reward.
Right click on it while it's not glowing to die.
relics.flavorText: Great for nefarious plans - as opposed to the Green Plotting Stone.

relics.name: Retaliation Kit
relics.description:
Upon pickup, brews a Smoke Bomb.
The first time your Block is broken each combat, apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke now included!

relics.name: Teal Tab
relics.description:
Add 2 copies of the 18th card you draw each combat to your hand.
They cost 0.
relics.flavorText: Useful for categorization.

relics.name: Timesight Glass
relics.description: At the start of every even-numbered turn, return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You can see yourself a few minutes before.

relics.name: Writhing Mask
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Malleable.
relics.flavorText: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.

relics.name: Adventure Pack
relics.description: Upon pickup, replace ALL cards in your deck with Discoveries.
relics.flavorText: You're about to have a trip!

relics.name: Berry Sword
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 8 Max HP.
The first 2 cards you play each combat are removed from your deck permanently.
relics.flavorText: Tiny bites of this sword invigorate you.

relics.name: Broadsword
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 2 Strength.
You draw one less card each turn.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a slightly oversized weapon!

relics.name: Double-Edged Sword
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 2 Strength and each enemy gains 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you an overly sharp blade!

relics.name: Draining Sword
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack, heal 1 HP.
At the start of each combat, lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a vampiric sword!

relics.name: Gorgon's Head
relics.description: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose 3 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Pretty, but still formidable.

relics.name: Imaginary Sword
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove two Attack cards from your deck.
relics.flavorText: Already, your memories of a smith feel faint...

relics.name: Infernal Sword
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, add a random Attack to your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.
relics.flavorText: This sword burns endlessly. You can't even hold it...

relics.name: Robot's Gift
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 2 Orb slots.
relics.flavorText: The thankful boon of a strange automaton.

relics.name: Rusty Sword
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, lose 1 Strength.
At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a crunchy sword...

relics.name: Short Stop
relics.description:
Future maps are 9 floors long.
If stuck, use the console's debug true command to teleport to the boss, then use debug false.
relics.flavorText: Weathered from hundreds of home runs.

relics.name: Ssserpent's Blood
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain Gold equal to the number of floors you've climbed.
relics.flavorText: You can buy anything!

relics.name: Toy Sword
relics.description:
Whenever you play an Attack, the enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.
At the start of each combat, lose 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: The smith fashioned you a little sword charm!

relics.name: Voice Box
relics.description: You can talk now.
relics.flavorText: You feel badly written.

relics.name: Big Berry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 22.
relics.flavorText: You had no idea they could get this big.

relics.name: Cursed Compass
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Future maps have 1 path.
relics.flavorText: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards ...

relics.name: Devious Botling
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Torments you at random occasions in unique ways.
relics.flavorText: Enjoys annoying you.

relics.name: Endless Sickness
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the start of each combat, shuffle a Virus into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Always multiplying.

relics.name: Hatred Engine
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
ALL ? rooms contain monsters.
relics.flavorText: They all deserve your blade! Go! Fight!

relics.name: Mall Pass
relics.description:
ALL ? rooms contain The Merchant.
Whenever you encounter The Merchant, gain 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: Now you can get the great discounts!

relics.name: Mind Devourer
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the end of each combat, a random card in your deck is removed.
relics.flavorText: Mm, shiny! Wait, what was your name again?

relics.name: Tangling Vine
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, take 1 damage.
Increase this damage by 1 each turn.
relics.flavorText: Don't take this the wrong way.

relics.name: Adventure Map
relics.description: ALL ? rooms contain events.
relics.flavorText: The real treasure was the friends we made along the way.

relics.name: Brain Blaster
relics.description: ALL enemies start battle Reactive.
relics.flavorText: Holding it near your head, you feel a terrible buzzing dizziness.

relics.name: Broken Bowl
relics.description: Whenever you add an unupgraded card to your deck, Upgrade it and lose 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: Sand drains from it endlessly.

relics.name: Chomping Noodles
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 3 Max HP and lose 9 HP.
relics.flavorText: These noodles bite back.

relics.name: Cooldron
relics.description: All Potions you obtain are Entropic Brews.
relics.flavorText: This cauldron is a lot cooler than any regular old cauldron.

relics.name: Ghostly Gear
relics.description: Whenever you play a πStrike or Defend, Exhaust it.
relics.flavorText: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.

relics.name: Golden Armor
relics.description:
Your health is ALWAYS equal to your Gold.
Instead of losing health, lose twice that much Gold.
relics.flavorText: Expensive... but worth it?

relics.name: Lich's Phylactery
relics.description:
Your max HP is ALWAYS 1.
Prevent ALL HP loss.
For every 6 damage prevented, remove a random card from your deck.
When your deck has no cards, you die.
relics.flavorText: It feels cold in your hands, no matter what you do ...

relics.name: Pill Tracker
relics.description: At the start of turn 5, remove all your Debuffs.
relics.flavorText: Always remember to take your medication on time!

relics.name: Regenerative Virus
relics.description:
Upon pickup, set your max HP to 30.
At the end of combat, heal to full HP.
relics.flavorText: The side effects are ... best left unsaid.

relics.name: Salvaging Tools
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this turn.
relics.flavorText: "Curious! These primitive things are utterly useless." -Ranwid

relics.name: Scavenger Helm
relics.description: If you have 2 or less cards in your hand at the end of your turn, you may Retain one.
relics.flavorText: Used by the tribes far from the Spire.

relics.name: Snail's Watch
relics.description: After you play 12 cards, end your turn and gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Someone is going to want this back.

relics.name: Sword of Lies
relics.description:
Start each combat with 1 Strength.
At the start of each combat, add a random Curse to your hand.
relics.flavorText: "I am the Sword of Truth."

potions.name: Blaze Potion
potions.description: Gain 2 stacks of ANY random buff.
